docs.text: Tomoyuki Yokogawa Associate Professor, Department of Systems Engineering , Faculty of Computer Science and Systems Engineering , Okayama Prefectural University [ DBLP ] Profile Tomoyuki Yokogawa received M.E. from Osaka University in 2001. He also received Ph.D. degree in Engineering from Osaka University in 2004. He is currently an associate professor at the Department of Systems Engineering, Okayama Prefectural University. He was an assintant professor at Okayama Prefectural University from Apr. 2007 to Mar. 2016, and was a research assistant at Okayama Prefectural University from May 2004 to Mar. 2007. He was working as a post-doctorial researcher at Osaka University in Apr. 2004. He is a member of IPSJ, IEICE, JSSST and IEEE. docs.text: Associate Professor, Department of Systems Engineering , Faculty of Computer Science and Systems Engineering , Okayama Prefectural University [ DBLP ]
docs.title: Tomoyuki Yokogawa

docs.text: Tomoyuki Yokogawa received M.E. from Osaka University in 2001. He also received Ph.D. degree in Engineering from Osaka University in 2004. He is currently an associate professor at the Department of Systems Engineering, Okayama Prefectural University. He was an assintant professor at Okayama Prefectural University from Apr. 2007 to Mar. 2016, and was a research assistant at Okayama Prefectural University from May 2004 to Mar. 2007. He was working as a post-doctorial researcher at Osaka University in Apr. 2004. He is a member of IPSJ, IEICE, JSSST and IEEE.
